document.masterDocTitle: An updated Checklist of the Mediterranean fishes of Israel, with illustrations of recently recorded species and delineation of Lessepsian migrants

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An updated Checklist of the Mediterranean fishes of Israel, with illustrations of recently recorded species and delineation of Lessepsian migrants

subSubSection.paragraph:
Tetrapturus belone : Ben-Tuvia, 1971a
; Lourie, 1972 (Ichthyoplan., Heb.); Golani, 1996; Golani, 2005; Golani & Levy, 2005 .

Auxis rochei : Landau & Ben-Tuvia, 1964
(Gen. Biol.; Heb.); Shmida, 1968 (Feed.; Heb.); Collette, 1970; Ben-Tu- via, 1971a; Lourie, 1972 (Ichthyoplan.; Heb.); Ben-Tuvia, 1983b (Fish.); Golani, 1996; Golani, 1997 (Heb.); Golani, 2005;
Gweta et al. 2008
; Sonin, 2009; Stern, 2010; Goren, et al., 2016.

Orcynopsis unicolor : Collette, 1970
; Ben-Tuvia, 1971a ; Golani, 1996; Golani, 2005.

Germo alalunga : Ben-Tuvia, 1953a
;
Oren et al., 1959
(Feed.); Ben-Tuvia, 1971a .

Thunnus thynnus : Ben-Tuvia, 1953a
;
Oren et al., 1959
(Fish., Feed.); Collette, 1970; Ben-Tuvia, 1971a ; Ben-Tuvia, 1983b (Fish.); Golani, 1996; Golani, 2005; Barash, et al ., 2018.

Schedophilus ovalis : Golani, 1996
; Golani, 2005; Edelist, 2006 (Art. Reef).
